description: Allow employees to request holiday time and manage approvals.
name: Holiday Request Form

steps.title: Holiday Request Form
steps.text: To ensure your time off is approved and documented properly, please complete the form with all necessary details.

blocks.label: Email Address
blocks.help: Provide your email address for communication regarding your request.
blocks.name: email

blocks.label: Phone Number
blocks.help: Enter your phone number for any necessary follow-up.
blocks.name: phone

blocks.label: Manager/Supervisor Name
blocks.help: Enter the name of your supervisor or manager for approval.
blocks.name: supervisor

blocks.label: Start Date of Holiday
blocks.help: Select the start date for your holiday.
blocks.name: date_start

blocks.label: End Date of Holiday
blocks.help: Select the end date for your holiday.
blocks.name: date_end

blocks.label: Signature
blocks.help: Sign to verify the accuracy of the information provided.
blocks.name: signature
